test.status:
Several failures occurred:
1) List '//select[@data-test="product_sort_container"]' should have had selection [ Name (Z to A) ] but selection was [ Name (A to Z) (az) ].
2) Lists are different: Index 0: Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red) != Sauce Labs Backpack Index 1: Sauce Labs Onesie != Sauce Labs Bike Light Index 2: Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket != Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt Index 3: Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt != Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket Index 4: Sauce Labs Bike Light != Sauce Labs Onesie Index 5: Sauce Labs Backpack != Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)
3) List '//select[@data-test="product_sort_container"]' should have had selection [ Price (low to high) ] but selection was [ Name (A to Z) (az) ].
4) List '//select[@data-test="product_sort_container"]' should have had selection [ Price (high to low) ] but selection was [ Name (A to Z) (az) ].
5) Page should not have contained text 'Sauce Labs Backpack'.
6) Page should have contained text 'Sauce Labs Backpack' but did not.
7) Page should have contained text 'Sauce Labs Backpack' but did not.
8) Element '(//*[contains(text(),'Remove')])[1]' not visible after 5 seconds.
9) Page should have contained text 'Sauce Labs Backpack' but did not.
10) Element with locator '(//*[contains(text(),'Remove')])[1]' not found.
11) Page should not have contained text 'Sauce Labs Backpack'.
12) Page should have contained text 'Error: Postal Code is required' but did not.
13) Element '//span[contains(text(),'Checkout: Overview')]' not visible after 5 seconds.
